Description:
We're looking for a skilled Private Chef to join our household. You'll be cooking for 9 people who love meat. Think simple, delicious, and hearty meals—no need for any fancy gourmet stuff.Responsibilities:Meal planning according to the tastes and dietary requirements of the family.
Preparing and cooking approximately 7 kilograms of meat daily.
Grocery shopping for ingredients; costs will be covered.
Keeping the kitchen clean after cooking.
Storing any leftovers properly for future meals.How to Apply:If you think you’re the chef we’re looking for, hit us up with your go-to meat recipes and why we should choose youSkills
Skills:
Basic cooking skills
Must specialize in meat-based dishes.
Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
Must be flexible in adapting to meal preferences, which will be provided after application.
Must be available 6 days a week, starting around 1 PM.
